mapper.select: select c.*, p.eng_name, p.kor_name, p.purchase, p.gender, p.release_date, p.color, p.release_price, p.img_route, p.img_route2, p.img_route3, b.name as brand_name, ct.name as category_name, s.name as size_name from cart_tb as c inner join product_tb as p on c.prod_id = p.id inner join brand_tb as b on p.brand_id = b.id inner join category_tb as ct on p.category_id = ct.id inner join size_tb as s on p.size_id = s.id where c.user_id = #{userId};
mapper.insert: insert into cart_tb (amount, prod_id, user_id) values (1, #{prodId}, #{userId})
